content:
{"name": "Bless Philadelphia Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Bless Philadelphia promotes the Peace, Prosperity, Health and Safety of Philadelpians through compassionate community engagement. 

Our neighborhood food pantry is currently open weekly on Sundays from 1-1:30pm

In order to receive food from our pantry, guests must be residents of Philadelphia county and must fill out the TEFAP self-declaration form

For more information about Bless Philadelphia visit blessphiladelphia.com", "email": "", "url": "https://www.blessphiladelphia.com/contact", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4610 Devereaux Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Northeast Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19135", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.02015249999999, "longitude": -75.0566656}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
